chart_description: The `system.idlejitter` chart measures the variation in time it takes for the CPU to go from an idle state to actively processing tasks, over a 1-second interval.

dimension_descriptions.average: The average amount of time, in microseconds lost per second, for the CPU to transition from an idle state to actively processing tasks.
dimension_descriptions.max: The highest amount of time, in microseconds lost per second, recorded for the CPU to transition from an idle state to actively processing tasks, over a 1-second interval.
dimension_descriptions.min: The lowest amount of time, in microseconds lost per second, recorded for the CPU to transition from an idle state to actively processing tasks, over a 1-second interval.
